com.facebook.litho.animation

Interface AnimatedProperty


  • public interface AnimatedProperty
    A property on a mount content (View or Drawable), e.g. x, y, scale, text color, etc.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float get(AnimatableItem animatableItem) 
      float get(java.lang.Object mountContent) 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      void reset(java.lang.Object mountContent)
      Resets this property to its default value on this mount content.
      void set(java.lang.Object mountContent, float value)
      Updates the value of this property on the given mount content to the given value.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of this property. It should be unique across properties that a mount content can have. It's used for identification purposes only. E.g., "x", "y", etc.

      • get

        float get(java.lang.Object mountContent)
        Returns:
        the current value of this property on the given mount content (View or Drawable).

      • get

        float get(AnimatableItem animatableItem)
        Returns:
        the current value of this property on the given AnimatableItem.

      • set

        void set(java.lang.Object mountContent,
         float value)
        Updates the value of this property on the given mount content to the given value.

      • reset

        void reset(java.lang.Object mountContent)
        Resets this property to its default value on this mount content.
